welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Justice, a charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We are excited to have you here and invite you to explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Midway Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport, where all domestic and international flights are serviced.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and other select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines and other select airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Chicago Lansing Municipal Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
